name: SOT
description:
Prototype - Project SOT

Reach the camp fire at the end! 

Attacks deplete stamina(green).

"Time Heist" consumes energy(blue), kill enemy to collect energy orb.

Press R to live ONCE more after death.

Spikes kill you for good!

Controls: 

Movement: W,S,A,D

Jump: Space

Light Attack: J

Heavy Attack: K

Dash: Press L while running

Back Step: Press L while idle

"Time Heist": Hold R
